text: Liocyma is a genus of molluscs in the family Veneridae.Abbott, R.T. & Morris, P.A. A Field Guide to Shells: Atlantic and Gulf Coasts and the West Indies. New York: Houghton Mifflin, 1995. 73. ==Species== * Liocyma fluctuosa (Gould, 1841) – wavy clam ==References== Category:Veneridae Category:Bivalve genera
title: Liocyma
